title: engine
content: # `prefect.engine` ## Functions ### `handle_engine_signals` ```python theme={null} handle_engine_signals(flow_run_id: UUID | None = None) ``` Handle signals from the orchestrator to abort or pause the flow run or otherwise handle unexpected exceptions. This context manager will handle exiting the process depending on the signal received. **Args:** * `flow_run_id`: The ID of the flow run to handle signals for.
